website_summaries.verdict: A classic, quality pocket knife from one of the oldest companies in the field. High-carbon stainless steel blades.
pros: Two 3-inch blades serve a multitude of purposes
Bone handle with grooves for secure grip
Lock-back system to protect your fingers
cons: While assembled in Germany, the parts are manufactured in China

customer_reviews.title: Great Folding Jack Knife
customer_reviews.text: Great little knife. Was looking for a bone slip joint, and ran across this Boker Copperhead. Very happy with the construction. Arrived in great condition, and just has a good look to it between the light and dark bone coloring along with the nickel played bolsters. Lining appears brass, has a good heft to it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Sobek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Knife!
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews, and some of the negative ones, and decided to go ahead and buy this one. This is a really great knife! Beautiful and weighty, rugged and sharp. Some reviews said that the blade says "China" on it, but mine does not (happy about that). I rated it only 4 stars because there is a tiny hairline crack in the handle (see pic, right side going into metal end). This doesn't bother me, in fact, I think it adds a little more ruggedness, but you expect a brand new knife to be flawless until you make the dings yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Post

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this knife for my son-in-law for Christmas he loved it, told his friends on a camping trip ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife for my son-in-law for Christmas he loved it , told his friends on a camping trip he got a knife for Christmas said its German . They all said at the same time a Boker . that made him very proud , it made me so proud I bought one for myself . really to good for my use . I love it too .
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife, so much that I couldn't bare to use it for the intended use and gave it to my Granddaughter for her collection. This is a beautiful knife. Intended use was to replace a lost Clauss single blade that mysteriously re-appeared. I hate to destroy something that looks so good. The blades a sharp and well finished.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to sharpen and very low profile
customer_reviews.text: I live in a state where we are close to the ocean. many live off of fishing, but where there are many tourists. Honolulu. I use this blade to cut my steaks in restaurants. It is easy to sharpen and very low profile, It does not 'raise eyebrows' like my other blades when I cut a steak.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy a very functional knife.
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. Worked well while spending a month backpacking in remote regions of Alaska. Worked without failure for things such as cutting spruce tree branches to make a ground bed to pitch my tent on. Also, very successful to cut willow branches while hiking (willow branches used to chase the mosquitoes and gnats flying about me).
customer_reviews.author: Mason Jahr

customer_reviews.title: function, fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: i am overwhelmed by the fit and finish of this knife! it's a little gem! worth ever penny...i am an instant fan and will buy Boker again.
customer_reviews.author: Wyllie

customer_reviews.title: It’s Boker
customer_reviews.text: I grew up in awe of the Boker Treebrand. This was for my son. It does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift for Christmas. It is of good quality and very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: dbeedle

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Very good product ,just wish that the picture color would match actually product color , the one I got came in a much darker color
customer_reviews.author: Arnulfo Luna

customer_reviews.title: The emblem on the knife came off soon after receiving ...
customer_reviews.text: The emblem on the knife came off soon after receiving it. We didn't send back but tried to repair ourselves, needless to say it wasn't worth what we paid for it. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive knife. Passed the sharpness test with flying colors - hold a piece of printer paper at arms length and observe how little pressure the downward cut from the edge takes and how clean is the cut. Takes a thin blade with a sharp edge to do it right. Highly recommended knife.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not as sharp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on reviews and I honestly don't think it holds an edge as well as my Buck knives. It has a nice feel and weight.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY HARSHA

customer_reviews.title: Good knife but...
customer_reviews.text: The emblem fell out when my brother was opening it as a Christmas gift from me. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: john l thomann

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, and (it's a knife
customer_reviews.text: Simple, functional, beautiful, and (it's a knife, of course), sharp as heck. Couldn't ask for more
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Connor

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is a good looking well built knife
customer_reviews.text: The scales are not properly fitted to the bolsters. Other than that it is a good looking well built knife. Unfortunate that such a minor detail can really affect the overall look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Human Bean

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, well made knife
customer_reviews.text: beautiful, well made knife. I'm super picky about the knives I carry and this one fits the bill for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Rider

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT! Bought as a gift, but I checked it out before giving it to the father in-law and now I want one!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the man in your life
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves it. Could not get a good photo, but it is about 4" long closed...some say it is 41/2", but no longer than 41/2"
customer_reviews.author: Silverpony

customer_reviews.title: Good "Jack Knife" but larger than I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent "Jack Knife," but much larger than I either expected or wanted. Be sure you read the dimensions of the knife before you purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Maeonides

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking knife
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my grandfather after he lost a similar one that he has had for years. He was very impressed by it. Made in Germany if I remember correctly. I think I might buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Fast fun

customer_reviews.title: Well made affordable pocket knife
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little knife, well made, very pretty, perfect to carry in your pocket. This was a gift for my adult son and he loves it and now his Brother wants the same knife too
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Owens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my son who likes to collect pocket knives. He's thrilled with it!

customer_reviews.title: the cure for zika?
customer_reviews.text: Boker makes fine steel and holds an edge once honed properly
customer_reviews.author: djuno1966

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about the quality of this knife. This is the 3rd one I purchased as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: LarTex

customer_reviews.title: Not as described. Total rip off by Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Not a German manufactured knife. No leather sheath as in the description, no blade lock as in the description. Total rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Gritzmacher

customer_reviews.title: He was very pleased with the quality of the knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a gentleman who makes his own knives. He was very pleased with the quality of the knife. I'm very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alabush

customer_reviews.title: A lot for your money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife but it was supposed to come with a brown leather sheath which I did not receive I don't know who to contact to get the sheath.
customer_reviews.author: john decoste

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality knives by Boker, who usually are good.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality. Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive knife. Good quality stainless steel that holds its sharpness very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Duran

customer_reviews.title: knife
customer_reviews.text: nice knife,but a little to big fo me to carry around in my pocket
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Brothers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife w/reasonable price. Very happy w/it
customer_reviews.author: guitsteve

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Its my first boker. But it wont be my last. I love it. It has a great feel well made. It’s my everyday pocket knife
customer_reviews.author: robert lowe

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, well made pocket knife. German made Boker's are good knives.
customer_reviews.author: Don Jost

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Fort the cost - you will not find a better pocket knife than this. It's not as alluring as the bigger blades - but if what you need is a pocket knife with a good cutting edge, solid molding (like grandpa used to carry) that you can use for mundane situations, then this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben M. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GOOD LOOKING AND HANDLING KNIFE. iT DOES NOT HOLD THE EDGE VERY LONG AND NEED CONSATANT STEELING AND SHARPENING. HAVE HAD OTHER TREE BRAND KNIFES WITH BETTER SHARPENING LONGEVITY THAT NEED VERY LITTLE SHARPENING MAINTENANCE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is good and a welcome gift to anyone who has taste. German quality is apparent in this item.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Heptner

customer_reviews.title: Can’ beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought four of these for gifts and everyone loved them. Well made and good looking
customer_reviews.author: OMAR CAVAZOS

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband for a Christmas gift and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Double-Barreled Cuttin' Tool
customer_reviews.text: I was initially just barely disappointed with the jigged bone scales. They are almost yellow and the "jigging" is a helter-skelter pattern, not at all like the photo. But on further consideration, isn't it the individual variations in the organic components of knives like these that make each of them one of a kind? So, rather than be disappointed, I think I'll go ahead and like this one for the size, shape and feel, for the two awesome razor-sharp blades, for the fit and finish, and for the over-all handsomeness of this mid-sized German import. To turn a phrase, it's "not too shabby." Think I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Silver City Slim

customer_reviews.title: I like the knife
customer_reviews.text: I like the knife. It was everything they said it would be and it came in a nice case for gift giving. However, for the money I would buy the mini trapper. In my opinion, it has a simpler more rugged look.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Pocket keeper
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the knife my dad carried back in the day. Well pleased
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What quality... Exactly what you would expect in the Boker brand... Fit, finish and packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product good the size not tight for the one receiving it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I need to say this Knive is espectacular beautiful and great produc
customer_reviews.author: José j meza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: EDC knife bigger than I thought. Cheaper than case knife.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Snyder

customer_reviews.title: ... free shipping got just what I wanted and just like described
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery even on free shipping got just what I wanted and just like described
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and effective. This little beauty is keeper for ...
customer_reviews.text: Compact and effective. This little beauty is keeper for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This will be a Christmas present, so I can't speak for how the recipient likes it yet but it's a beautiful looking knife, that feels very sturdy. It looks very well made, nothing scuffed, rough or uneven. I'm sure it will be a big hit and, for the price, I doubt you could find this knife (brand new) elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Hillbillie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but not quite what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It was a larger knive than I wanted so I returned it. But it was a beautiful knife.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Meadiws

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality.
customer_reviews.text: Nice knife but has cheap stainless steel blades. They didn't keep Sharp like Carbon steel blades do.
customer_reviews.author: prescottkid

customer_reviews.title: great knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to give my dad as a gift and he loved it I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Great asset ot my collection
customer_reviews.text: Best knife on my collection greta quality nicest and lowest price ever will cherish for ever german steel still the best
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: packaging sucked it big time.. the knife was flopping around in the box, but my husband likes the knife.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Boker Ts Copperhead Pocket Knife (Brown)
customer_reviews.text: Very good blades, fits in your right front pocket great for work and sharpen easy with good honing steel.Will worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: zeb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boss as a secret Santa gift. I'll be getting myself one.

customer_reviews.title: He is pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my father. He is pleased with it.

product_meta.title: Boker 110723 Ts Copperhead Pocket Knife with Two Blades, Brown
product_meta.description: The Boker Ts Copperhead Pocket Knife is a traditional pocket knife built with premium components. 440C steel makes the blade durable and reliable. Finger grooves crafted into the handle give you superior control while also making the handle feel nicer. An elegant brown bone handle completes the look, giving the knife an eye-catching appearance. The lock back mechanism ensures that your fingers are always safe when dealing with the knife. The Boker Ts Copperhead Pocket Knife comes with a brown leather sheath for all-purpose carrying. The length of the blade is 3 in. and the overall length is 6 3/4 in. Limited lifetime warranty. A chestnut tree is the world famous trademark of the Boker knife manufactory in Solingen, Germany. It represents innovative, high quality, exceptional knives, manufactured with pride, by hand, for over 145 years.
feature_bullets: High carbon stainless steel blades make this blade strong and sharp
Nickel silver bolsters and brass linings
Blade Length: 3 in. Overall Length: 6 3/4 in.
